member_organisations: The ECA has 28 members from across Europe (both EU and non-EU), the full list can be found on the ECA website: http://www.europeancasinoassociation.org/about-eca/eca-members/
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Sport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
Digital Single Market 
Anti-Money Laundering policies 
Other gambling-related initiatives and activities from the EU institutions
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The ECA represents licensed land-based casinos in Europe, with 28 members and over 70,000 direct employees supporting local economies across Europe. The main purpose and objective of the ECA is to address and promote issues related to casinos and/or casino operations. In so doing, the ECA provides a focal point on casino matters for casino operators as well as for EU and national policy makers and stakeholders.
